metadata.inclusion: After doing inclusion action on controller, then hold 5 seconds “STOP SOUND” button till hearing beep once
metadata.exclusion: After doing exclusion action on controller, then hold 5 seconds “STOP SOUND” button till hearing beep once
metadata.reset:
Hold 10 seconds “STOP SOUND” button till hearing beep once

-Use this procedure only in the event that the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
